items.sentence: I don't want to do anything that might disturb Tom.
You're better at explaining things than my teacher.
That was the first time that I'd ever seen a koala.
Our new restaurant is scheduled to open in October.
Tom took a sip of coffee and then set his cup down.
Tom has been accused of setting the church on fire.
Tom and Mary had to keep their relationship secret.
Tom and Mary were in the same class in high school.
Tom decided he'd do whatever he could to help Mary.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean for any of this to happen.
